The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 30 August is 288,989 (513.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 26 August, there were 6,616 new confirmed cases (11.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 19 August, there were 6,367 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 4% (249 extra cases).
